title: Forward to Camelot
description: Where were you the day Kennedy was saved? History CAN be altered ... Actress Cady Cuyler is recruited to time travel back to Dallas in November 1963, and recover President Kennedy’s personal Bible. It was used to swear in Lyndon Johnson as President aboard Air Force One after Kennedy's assassination, and later disappeared. Now it is a priceless historic artifact. But Cady has another, more personal mission as To change the fate of her beloved father, who disappeared without a trace on the day JFK died. The startling truths she uncovers and the terrifying dangers she faces lead her to the most perilous mission of To somehow save President Kennedy’s life, with the help of one unlikely A courageous ex-Marine named Lee Harvey Oswald. At its heart, FORWARD TO CAMELOT is the story of two exceptional men, and a message of hope for all of us. It is a rare opportunity to re-visit an era that once was, and dream of an America that might have been.
author: Susan Sloate
